item.description:
It's time for our twice-annual Open House!  Come and see our space, where our art is displayed, where we welcome fellow artists to learn and share (we have openings for a few new members) and where we hold workshops and open studio days when we welcome you to come and play and learn new techniques.

 

This event is free for everyone and there is no attendance limit.  The doors open at 11 a.m. and we plan to start cleaning up at 5 p.m.  During that time we will be offering some of our artwork for sale -- a perfect chance to find a last-minute Mother's Day gift, supporting both local artists *and* ArtStudio360! -- as well as a card-making activity.  Children are welcome at this event and we will have a few things for them to do as well.   Drinks and snacks are provided.

 

Hope to see you there!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: ArtStudio 360 Open House
